{{小写标题}} {{Album Infobox |标题颜色= #FF7200 |左栏颜色= #FFB366 |专辑名称= first odyssey of fripSide |image= 1st odyssey of fripSide.jpg |发行= sat-music-records |发行地区= 日本 |发行日期= 2003年4月12日 |商品编号= SCFS-0301 |专辑类型= 录音室专辑 |年表= {{Album Infobox/Chronology |name= [[fripSide]]专辑年表 |标题颜色= #FF7200 |前一作= |后一作= 《[[2nd fragment of fripSide]]》
(2004) |本作= 《first odyssey of fripSide》
(2003) }} }} 《'''first odyssey of fripSide'''》是[[fripSide]]的第一张专辑。 == 简介 == *[[fripSide]]的第一张同人专辑。 *[[小册子(唱片)|BK]]中没有附带歌词，但歌词可以从fripSide的官网上得到。 *专辑原本打算收录《my graduation》和《Your Ocian从后来的专辑《[[The very best of fripSide 2002-2006]]》之后，标题被修正为“Your Ocean”(album mix)》两首歌曲。 *其中《Love to Sing -HEAVENS WiRE RMX-》没有收录在后来的专辑《[[the very best of fripSide 2002-2006]]》与《[[nao complete anthology 2002-2009 -my graduation-]]》中。 *商品番号“SCFS”即“SATのCD FRIP SIDE”的意思，被fripSide的非主流出道专辑一直沿用了下去。 == 专辑 == {{BilibiliVideo|id=8949096|page=1}} == 收录曲目 == {{tracklist | longnote_column = yes | title1 = '''introduction''' | longnote1 = 纯音乐 | length1 = 1:24 | title2 = '''[[distant moon]]''' | longnote2 = | length2 = 5:07 | title3 = '''[[come to mind]]''' | longnote3 = | length3 = 5:26 | title4 = '''Love to Sing''' | longnote4 = | length4 = 4:45 | title5 = '''[[Colorless fate]]''' | longnote5 = | length5 = 6:13 | title6 = '''Your Ocian -azure reproduct mix-''' | longnote6 = | length6 = 5:26 | title7 = '''[[be sure…‎|be sure… -album mix-]]''' | longnote7 = | length7 = 5:10 | title8 = '''[[bright days]]''' | longnote8 = | length8 = 5:25 | title9 = '''in the future -side02-''' | longnote9 = | length9 = 5:56 | title10 = '''Love to Sing -HEAVENS WiRE RMX-''' | longnote10 = | length10 = 4:57 | title11 = '''end game原定标题为“end roll”''' | longnote11 = | length11 = 4:15 }} {{fripSide}} == 注释 == [[分类:2003年音乐专辑‎]] [[分类:录音室专辑‎]]
